prosecutorCost.description: Prosecutor cost will be surfaced in the summons and defendant is liable to pay this amount.  Should be captured as Â£300.00

prosecutorEmailAddress.description: Email address to be used for sending notification to prosecutor on application approval / rejection

summonsSuppressed.description: Flag to indicate if the prosecutor will serve summons to the defendant and the court will not do the same

personalService.description: Flag to indicate if summons will be served to the defendant in person (delivery by hand)
